value.title: The new Power BI Mobile look (September 2019)
value.excerpt: Patrick shows the new Power BI Mobile app look and how to navigate it. Also allowing for multiple Power BI accounts.  Guy in a Cube courses: https://guyinacu.be/courses  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba

value.title: Using DAX to format a list of values in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Alberto Ferrari joins Patrick to walk through how you can use DAX to format a list of values within Power BI Desktop. This takes the concatenate values quick measure to the next level.  Original Quick Measure video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SjSKCZtiNlI  Alberto's article - https://www.sqlbi.com/blog/alberto/2018/12/20/displaying-a-list-of-selected-months/

value.title: Using R Visuals with Power BI
value.excerpt: You can take advantage of the R Script showcase to start using R Visuals with your reports. These provide great examples of what your R Script should look like to interact with data and you can compare how your visual looks to the example.   R Script Showcase - http://community.powerbi.com/t5/R-Script-Showcase/bd-p/RVisuals

value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. In this video, I am going to show you how easy is to calculate Age in Power BI using Power BI. This method is very useful

value.title: Calculating Stock on Hand Using DAX   Power BI Inventory Model
value.excerpt: You don't have always the luxury of having a snapshot fact table that has the stock on hand value for every single day, at every single workshop, and for every single product. Even if you want to build such a table, it can get easily gigantic. In this video, I am going to show you how you can use DAX

value.title: Change Excel Source in Power BI to OneDrive for Business   No Gateway Needed

value.title: Create Row Number for Each Group in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: If you want to create a row-number statically as a pre-calculation in Power BI, then Power Query has a very simple way of doing it; Add Index Column. However, the Index column creates the row number regardless of any grouping or categorization. sometimes you want to take that into account too. There

value.title: Currency Exchange Rate Conversion in Power BI with Live Rates   Part 2
value.excerpt: In the previous part of the currency exchange rate conversion, I provided a function script that you can use to get live rates using a free API. In that part, you learned how you can create a table in dataflow using live rates. In this video, I will show you how you can use the currency conversion table

value.title: Find a Text Term in a Field in Power BI Using DAX Functions
value.excerpt: In Power BI, there are multiple ways of searching for a text term inside a text field, you can use Power Query for doing this operation or calculations in DAX. In this video, I'll explain some functions in DAX that you can use to do this calculation. Most of these functions can be used inside a measure

value.title: Get Data from Multiple Excel Files with Different Sheet Names into Power BI
value.excerpt: The ability to use Get Data from Folder in Power BI is a very useful option. However, if your sheet names are different in the list of Excel files, then you will face a problem. In this video, I‚Äôll explain a method you can use that works regardless of the sheet names. Download the sample files from my
